name: Flappy Copter
description:
This game is old version and is discontinued. New version is available as "Endless Copter : Ruch"

Guide your Helicopter to go through dangers. Classic game play in new style. In garage you can doo color switch for vehicle and view the changes to your Helicopter. Beautiful 2D graphic art style.

Good things about this game:
- No violence.
- No Microtransactions.
- Do not require internet access.
- You can play it offline.
- Great way to kill free time.

How to PLAY:
- Tap and hold on the screen to get lift
- Release to glide down
- Collect fuel to flay longer
- Collect Wrenches to fix Your Helicopter
- Avoid air and ground obstacle.
- And have Fun!
